DependenciesÂ¶

dnn-inference requires:

Python>=3.8

numpy

User installationÂ¶

Install dnn-inference using pip

pip install dnn_inference
pip install git+https://github.com/statmlben/dnn-inference.git

Source codeÂ¶

You can check the latest sources with the command.
